Welcome to Leisure and Culture

Gym membership

Whether you are new to the gym or if
you have simply got out of the habit
suites offer a friendly and inviting
atmosphere that cater for all ages and
offer state of the art fitness
machines and a full range of weight
resistance equipment. You can also use
in Huyton and Halewood cater for
people who have not exercised for many

Registered user card

It is FREE to sign up for the
Registered User Card. The card enables
you to call up in advance and book
indoor courts using our new MRN Plus 2

Gold card membership

Our Gold membership entitles the holder
to use any Shapers fitness suite
squash courts during off peak times.
Contact the centre of your choice for

Silver card membership

Our Silver membership entitles the
holder to use any Shapers fitness
room before 4.30 pm Monday to Friday
and all day Saturday and Sunday. In
Monday to Friday and all Saturday and

Shaper plus membership

Our Shapers Plus membership enables
you to use all the Shapers Plus toning
tables both on and off peak.

Joint memberships

Our joint membership scheme allows you
to join with a partner and make a

Joint Gold membership

Monthly cost by Direct Debit – £50.50

Joint Silver membership

Monthly cost by Direct Debit – £36.50

all the centres listed below. The
sessions are for young people between
The Junior Shokk gym in Kirkby Sports
Centre is exclusively for young people
induction the junior gym members can
use the facilities at specific times.
